page.title: 15Marwell Zoological Park 1
page.content: The Park was opened in May 1972 in the grounds of Marwell Hall.The estate was owned by the Seymour family in Tudor times and was described in the Domesday Book. Mr.J.Knowles was responsible for the original development of the Zoological Park.Since 1978 it has been administered as a charitable trust with Mr.Knowles as Director.Its stated aims closely parallel his initial ideals:1.To preserve endangered species of animals in captivity and to provide animals for rehabilitation to the wild where possible; 2.To educate people about the need for such conservation and to stimulate concern about wild life; 3.To undertake research to improve husbandry in zoos.
